actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: A bill to give the Secretary of State responsibility for monitoring the overseas business activities of American companies in order to detect any violations of Federal law.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of State to monitor the overseas business activities of American companies and to report any possible violation of Federal law by such companies to the appropriate Federal agency.

titles.title: A bill to give the Secretary of State responsibility for monitoring the overseas business activities of American companies in order to detect any violations of Federal law.
